about_the_game:
There are enemy spies hiding among the secret service agents.
The spies' goal is to disrupt the agents' activities and eliminate them all.

Agents can report suspects by hosting meetings and vote to expel them.
To complete the mission, you need to eliminate spies hiding in the team or complete the operation.
However, the victory goes to the spies if all the agents being eliminated before the operation is completed.

This game is an identity concealment style, in which the player is divided into two cliques, the agent team and the spy team, and take action to achieve the respective victory conditions.

Number of players: 4-8

Available for multiple players with voice chat function in-game. (Using voice chat is recommended).

-Agents-.


The agents are imposed to transfer the coins they have earned, fill up the helicopter with fuel and escape, or find and get rid of the spies who are hiding in the team.

If you see anyone suspicious, call a meeting!

-Spies-


The mission of the spies is to eliminate all the agents. To achieve this, pretending to be an agent, obtain and use the items and weapons from the spy armoury or use the spy gadgets that you equip with you for the mission.

Spy gadgets are secret weapons dedicated for spies that can be equipped in for the mission.
You can use it as many times as you want by purchasing it in the store.



Transceiver can be purchased at the store, that can host a meeting to start discussion.
You can get a player to expulsion at the meeting, by voting someone you think is suspicious.
One player, one vote.
detailed_description:
Update Notes

2023/04/22 New item "Killer Badge" and third camp "Killer".
2023/02/21 New map "Secret Lab" has been implemented.
2022/08/27 New mode "Hunting" was implemented
2022/08/27 Zombie Pirates Shima skin was implemented
2022/07/03 Text chat feature implemented
2022/06/25 Open Room Match function implemented


About the Game

There are enemy spies hiding among the secret service agents.
The spies' goal is to disrupt the agents' activities and eliminate them all.

Agents can report suspects by hosting meetings and vote to expel them.
To complete the mission, you need to eliminate spies hiding in the team or complete the operation.
However, the victory goes to the spies if all the agents being eliminated before the operation is completed.

This game is an identity concealment style, in which the player is divided into two cliques, the agent team and the spy team, and take action to achieve the respective victory conditions.

Available for multiple players with voice chat function in-game. (Using voice chat is recommended).

If you see anyone suspicious, call a meeting!

name: SPY RUMBLE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10以降
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000; Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Armed Citizens Strike Back! New sensation action wargame SPY RUMBLE！
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
